bibl.title: Praefectus castrorum Aegypti - A reconsideration.
bibl.note: The praefectus castrorum Aegypti is the prefect in charge of the double camp at Alexandria, a title retained and alternated with praefectus legionis II Traianae when II Traiana was the sole legion in Egypt. - Pp. 335-337: Appendix of extracts from inscriptions.
Dobson Brian, Praefectus castrorum Aegypti - A reconsideration.
